name: Mathematics
description: Comprehensive mathematics including algebra, geometry, calculus, and statistics. Focuses on problem-solving, logical thinking, and mathematical reasoning.

name: English Literature
description: Advanced study of literature, composition, and language arts. Covers classic and contemporary works, writing skills, and critical analysis.

name: Biology
description: Study of living organisms, their structure, function, growth, and evolution. Includes laboratory work and scientific methodology.

name: World History
description: Comprehensive study of world civilizations, major historical events, and their impact on modern society. Includes cultural and social perspectives.

name: Art & Design
description: Creative arts including drawing, painting, sculpture, digital art, and design principles. Encourages artistic expression and creative thinking.

name: Physics
description: Study of matter, energy, and their interactions. Covers mechanics, thermodynamics, electromagnetism, and modern physics concepts.

name: Chemistry
description: Study of matter, its properties, and chemical reactions. Includes laboratory experiments, atomic theory, and chemical bonding.

name: Physical Education
description: Physical fitness, sports, and health education. Promotes physical well-being, teamwork, and healthy lifestyle choices.

name: Computer Science
description: Programming, algorithms, data structures, and computer systems. Prepares students for technology careers and digital literacy.

name: Psychology
description: Study of human behavior, mental processes, and psychological principles. Covers cognitive, developmental, and social psychology.
